# Create DOE Prototype Building Copy

## Description
Creates the DOE Reference Building Models as starting points for other analyses.

## Modeler Description


## Measure Type
ModelMeasure

## Taxonomy


## Arguments


### Building Type.

**Name:** building_type,
**Type:** Choice,
**Units:** ,
**Required:** true,
**Model Dependent:** false

**Name:** template,
**Type:** Choice,
**Units:** ,
**Required:** true,
**Model Dependent:** false

**Name:** climate_zone,
**Type:** Choice,
**Units:** ,
**Required:** true,
**Model Dependent:** false

**Type:** Choice,
